rangeOverflow.date: Please select a date that is no later than {max}.
rangeOverflow.datetime: Please select a date and time that is no later than {max}.
rangeOverflow.default: Please select a value that is less or equal to {max}.
rangeOverflow.month: Please select a month that is no later than {max}.
rangeOverflow.number: Please select a value that is no more than {max}.
rangeOverflow.time: Please select a time that is no later than {max}.
rangeOverflow.week: Please select a week that is no later than {max}.

rangeUnderflow.date: Please select a date that is no earlier than {min}.
rangeUnderflow.datetime: Please select a date and time that is no earlier than {min}.
rangeUnderflow.default: Please select a value that is greater or equal to {min}.
rangeUnderflow.month: Please select a month that is no earlier than {min}.
rangeUnderflow.number: Please select a value that is no less than {min}.
rangeUnderflow.time: Please select a time that is no earlier than {min}.
rangeUnderflow.week: Please select a week that is no earlier than {min}.

required.checkbox: Please check this box if you want to proceed.
required.email: Please enter a valid email address.
required.radio: Please select one of these options.

step.boundary: Please select a valid value. The two nearest valid values are {lowerBoundary} and {upperBoundary}.

form.tooLong: Please use {max} characters at maximum (you are currently using {current}).
form.tooShort: Please use at least {min} characters (you are currently using {current}).

type.email: Please enter a valid email address.

placeholder.usernameEmail: Enter your email address or username...
placeholder.userRoleName: Enter the name of the user role...

general.noPermissionsText: You don't have the permissions to visit the '%{title}' page.

general.signInAnotherAccount: Sign in with another user account.

passwordForgot.infoText: Please enter your email address to reset your password.

passwordReset.infoText: Please enter your email address, a new password and the security token, we sent you per email, to reset your password.

register.contactUs: If you still cannot find an email, please contact us.
register.note: Note: If you do not receive the email in few minutes, please check your spam folder and verify if you typed your email correctly.
